name: TestimonialCardFive
description: Full-width carousel testimonial section with split card layout showing text content and square image side-by-side.

description.example: Hear from those who've experienced our work

name.note: Full name including role and company (e.g., 'John Smith, CTO of Tech Corp')

title.example: We've got only good things to say!
title.note: Testimonial headline shown at 4xl, truncated to 3 lines

quote.example: We have been working with them for over 6 months now, and have been able to scale our business to new heights.
quote.note: Full testimonial text shown at base/lg size, truncated to 10 lines

tag.note: Category or plan tag displayed at top of card

avatarSrc.note: Avatar image shown in TestimonialAuthor component (h-11 aspect-square)

imageSrc.note: Either imageSrc or videoSrc should be provided for optimal display

videoSrc.note: Either imageSrc or videoSrc should be provided for optimal display

itemRules.note: Works best with 5-6 testimonials. Auto-advances every 5 seconds with loop enabled.

propsSchema.testimonials: Array<{ id: string, name: string, date: string, title: string, quote: string, tag: string, avatarSrc: string, avatarAlt?: string, imageSrc?: string, videoSrc?: string, imageAlt?: string, videoAriaLabel?: string }>
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample: <TestimonialCardFive testimonials={[{ id: '1', name: 'Alisa Hester, CEO of Ecomflow', date: 'Date: 28 October 2024', title: 'We\'ve got only good things to say!', quote: 'We have been working with them for over 6 months now, and have been able to scale our business to new heights.', tag: 'Standard Line', avatarSrc: '/avatar.jpg', imageSrc: '/testimonial.jpg' }]} title="What Our Clients Say" description="Hear from those who've experienced our work" textboxLayout="default" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} />
dont: Do not use less than 3 items
Do not use more than 10 items
